title: Publisher Correction: Stabilized coronavirus spikes are resistant to conformational changes induced by receptor recognition or proteolysis
body:
Correction to: Scientific Reports 10.1038/s41598-018-34171-7, published online 24 October 2018

The original version of this Article contained an error in Affiliation 2, which was incorrectly given as ‘Department of Biochemistry and Cellular Biology, Geisel School of Medicine at Dartmouth, Hanover, NH, 03755, Germany’. The correct affiliation is listed below:

Department of Biochemistry and Cellular Biology, Geisel School of Medicine at Dartmouth, Hanover, NH, 03755, USA’

This error has now been corrected in the HTML and PDF versions of the Article.
